item.title: Help with this i dont know why error!
item.dc:creator: @juessx juessx
item.description:
@juessx wrote:

TimeFromMark isn’t used like that.

You do MarkTime(Mark);

if(TimeFromMark(Mark) > 30000)then
Writeln(‘30 seconds passsed!’);

Read full topic
item.source: Help with this i dont know why error!

item.title: Help with this i dont know why error!
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Try this:[code]PROGRAM dende;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
VAR c :integer;
d :integer;
FUNCTION t :integer;
BEGIN
REPEAT
IF (invcount = invcount + 1) THEN result:=timefrommark;
UNTIL(invcount=invcount+1)
END;

PROCEDURE findtree(var x,y:integer);
BEGIN
findmscolor(x,y,4354451);
mmouse(x,y,6,6);
IF option2(‘ree’) THEN
mouse(x,y,6,6,true);
marktime(var timemarker: integer);
WAIT(t);

END;
BEGIN
cleardebug;
setupsrl;
disguisescar(‘Msn Messenger’);
activateclient;
setrun(true);
d:=1;
t:=
REPEAT
FOR c:=1 TO d DO
BEGIN
findtree(x,y);
IF (invcount=invcount+1) THEN d:=invcount;
END;
dropalllogs;
UNTIL (false)
END.[/code]

All i get is this error:Failed when compiling Line 8: [Error] (17174:55): Invalid number of parameters in script

I can’t be bothered to fix but you might be able too.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with this i dont know why error!

item.title: Help with this i dont know why error!
item.dc:creator: @d3nd3 d3nd3
item.description:
@d3nd3 wrote:

[code]
PROGRAM dende;
{.include srl/SRL.scar}
VAR c :integer;
d :integer;
FUNCTION t :integer;
BEGIN
IF invcount = invcount + 1 THEN (result):=(timefrommark);
REPEAT UNTIL invcount=invcount+1
END;

PROCEDURE findtree(var x,y:integer);
BEGIN
findmscolor(x,y,4354451);
mmouse(x,y,6,6);
IF option2(‘ree’) THEN
mouse(x,y,6,6,true);
marktime(var timemarker: integer);
WAIT(t);

END;
BEGIN
cleardebug;
setupsrl;
disguisescar(‘Msn Messenger’);
activateclient;
setrun(true);
d:=1;
t:=
REPEAT
FOR c:=1 TO d DO
BEGIN
findtree(x,y);
IF (invcount=invcount+1) THEN d:=invcount;
END;
dropalllogs;
UNTIL false;

END.[/code]

I know the code is unfinished, but during function t , it keeps saying error, such as identifier etc, begin needed, :S dont know why! plz help, really appreciated

Line 7: [Error] (17668:33): Identifier expected in script , you see… the cursor then goes inbetween the command “THEN” :mad:

Read full topic
item.source: Help with this i dont know why error!
